document_data.caption: A map showing Cook Street and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Cook Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Cook Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Cook Street was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. Cook Street originated on [[Lackpurse Lane]] at the border between the Castle Ward and [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]], branching north before terminating at a dead end just shy of [[Soldier's Street]]. Other roads connecting with Cook Street included [[Soothsayer's Way]] and [[Rainrun Street]].
